Pot plants in potholes on Te Puna road near SH2, Tauranga, prompts swift result https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/pot-plants-put-in-potholes-on-te-puna-road-near-sh2-north-of-tauranga/ P2WTBDKFPRG5ZNADQ6OYITEK4E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/pot-plants-put-in-potholes-on-te-puna-road-near-sh2-north-of-tauranga/ P2WTBDKFPRG5ZNADQ6OYITEK4E/ Kiri GillespieIt comes after roundabout grass was baled by a rogue farmer in the same community. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 23:04:39 +0000 Potholes have been filled in, right, after pot plants were placed inside them at a Te Puna slip road, north of Tauranga.
